update_guidance.check_archive_chats: Review past chat logs or plugin commits for new instructions or logic that hasn't been pulled into scripts or memory.
update_guidance.recommendation: Every plugin or script update should begin by checking the master plan JSON, the DBS reference index, and the latest conversation logs or changelog entries in /logs/ or /dbs-terminal-memory.json.
